title: Angelus Leather Dye Jet Black
feature: Heavily pigmented dye to penetrate leather
Will not peel, crack, or wash off
Can be diluted for desired color results
Perfect for re-coloring saddles, tack, shoes, belts, purses and more
Single 3 ounce jar with wool dauber
description: Angelus Leather Dyes are guaranteed to penetrate leather and form a lasting color that will not crack, peel, or wash off. The heavily pigmented dye is perfect for re-coloring tack, saddles, shoes, belts, purses, wood and other porous surfaces. Available in a wide color range, with the ability to be diluted for custom color results, making it the perfect product to restore leather products. Single 3 ounce jar with a wool dauber included, Jet Black. Made in the USA.
